name: !coinflip {choice} {betAmount}
description: Flip a coin using economy. Choice can be `heads`, `head`, `h`, `tails`, `tail`, `t`. betAmount must be number. Example !cf heads 200

name: !coinflip {betAmount} {choice}
description: Flip a coin using economy. Choice can be `heads`, `head`, `h`, `tails`, `tail`, `t`. betAmount must be number. Example !cf 200 tails

name: !coinflip min {newBetAmount}
description: Set a custom minimum bet amount

name: !coinflip max {newBetAmount}
description: Set a custom maximum bet amount

name: !coinflip ongoingmessage {newMessage}
description: Set a custom ongoing message. Use `reset` to reset to default

name: !coinflip outcomemessage {newMessage}
description: Set a custom outcome message. Use `reset` to reset to default

name: Placeholder Support List
description: We allow your administrator to set both custom ongoing and outcome message for support placeholder. - {choice} = user bet choice. - {outcome} =  flip result heads or tails. - {betamount} = original bet amount. - {amount} = total wining amount. - {won} = can be lost or won based of outcome. - {icon} = your economy icon. Don't worry here an example for use: `You spent {icon}{betAmount} and chose {choice} The coin is flipping...`
